document.full_text: a qantas airways flight returned to bangkok on friday after pilots were forced to shut down one of the aircraft's engines, the latest in a string of incidents involving rolls-royce engines.
document.title: qantas flight returns to bangkok after engine shutdown
lines_and_colors: a qantas airways flight returned to bangkok on friday after pilots were forced to shut down one of the aircraft's engines, the latest in a string of incidents involving rolls-royce engines.
